tool_description: Analyzes historical data to identify and quantify underlying trends, growth patterns, and directional changes in demand over time.

analysis_method.description: Trend analysis method: linear, exponential, polynomial

error_messages: Insufficient data points: Need at least 10 data points for trend analysis
Invalid analysis method: Use linear, exponential, or polynomial
Smoothing factor out of range: Must be between 0.1 and 0.9
usage: Provide historical_data array and select analysis_method. Adjust smoothing_factor for trend sensitivity.

trend_direction.description: Overall trend direction: increasing, decreasing, stable
